InstructionData.Title: Furnace Control
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: alias Furnace d0​ alias Purge d1​ alias Fill d2​ alias Mixer d3​ alias Switch d4​ ​ alias pressure r0​ alias hasGas r1​ alias switch r2​ ​ wait:​ s db Setting 0​ l pressure Furnace Pressure​ sgt hasGas pressure 0​ s Purge On hasGas​ s Fill On 0​ s Mixer On 0​ l switch Switch Setting​ bgtz switch purge​ yield​ j wait​ ​ purge:​ s db Setting 1​ l switch Switch Setting​ bgtz switch wait​ l pressure Furnace Pressure​ sgt hasGas pressure 0​ s Purge On hasGas​ blez pressure prime​ yield​ j purge​ ​ prime:​ s db Setting 2​ l switch Switch Setting​ bgtz switch wait​ s Fill On 1​ s Fill Setting 1​ s Furnace Activate 1​ s Mixer On 1​ s Mixer Setting 1​ yield​ j prime
